description: On the final day of Abella’s stay in the Armory, she is with us on DeviceBondage, and already sad that this is her last day. She is the real deal, and as genuine as they come. She needs this and the thought of it ending has her in tears. WE get to it and lock her in and let the torment begin. She suffers at the hands of The Pope just like she begged to do. The pain is a welcomed friend for her and it shows in every grueling scene.
title: Young Pain Slut Devastated in Grueling Bondage, Tormented, and Cumming
